comment: Ok, as long as you do what you are supposed to do and submit the basic stuff like the weekly and stuff, then you will pass with flying colors. Half of her class is all busy work. She has 3 major essays that basically dictate your grade, also she just gives you a grade, no like "running average", so if you just do your work, you will be fine

Professor Cochran is amazing.  She always emailed me back quickly even if it was on the weekend.  She gives great advice and instructions.  I wish I could of gotten in her class for English 1102, but they are all in person and I needed online.  She always made sure to give positive feedback on all of my essays.

Honestly, she wasn't too bad. Just a lot of work overload.
Sometimes picky when it comes to grading and doesn't explain what she wants for assignments sometimes.

It was several assignments due in one week, so it was a lot. She's overall a caring and open-minded professor. The only issue would be how she grades assignments, which would be confusing. It wasn't clear what she wanted. But you can always ask, and she will tell you. I wouldn't take her again because of the work overload.
Professor Cochran was the best. She respected students and never made you feel stupid for asking questions. Was prompt in responding to emails, and was always very helpful and informative.

hands down one of the best profs i had, hated how we had to do group work that we were randomly assigned to. if you don't show up to lecture you will miss out on alot. love how she gave us the choice to pick out music for us to play in class. her grading and papers are easy. she likes for you to be creative! gives alot of extra credit if you need.

Ms. Cochran was very sweet and the class was fairly easy. We have three papers over the course of the semester and two group projects. Rest of the grades are discussion boards, which are very easy. Show up to class as attendance is a grade. Very nice professor!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I loved this professor, easily the best I had my freshman year. I took her for the second English as well. You can tell she has a passion for English,cares about her students, and is understanding of circumstances. She's very responsive, answers all emails, and the work is doable and not too heavy. Choose her!

shes very boring and talks super quietly and is very hard to follow because of her monotone lectures. her assignments are confusing and you cant really keep up with them and most of the class is usually very lost. shes a nice lady tho and is understanding if youre sick or whatever, just not a great lecturer

I loved Ms. Cochran. Your overall grade consisted of 3 major essays, attendance, and some discussion posts. There is also a weekly textbook chapter as well.
For your major essays you receive peer review, as well as feedback from Ms. Cochran. This class is an easy A... if you put effort in.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Ms. Cochran is a professor who cares about student success. Extra credit opportunities that are easy to complete. Fair grader and very lenient with deadlines. Lots of writing with multiple in-class assignments, short writing assignments, and three papers. She gives detailed, helpful, and constructive feedback.
Professor Cochran is a amazing professor!! She truly cares about her student and she has a manageable workload. She is was my favorite professor of the fall semester, and truly a pleasure.

Words can't describe how much I love Professor Cochran. She's a wonderful teacher who takes all the anxiety out of writing. She is my favorite professor of the year. Gives great feedback and is always encouraging her students. Her assignments are easy to understand and she is a quick to respond to any questions. I wish I could taker her for 1102!

Donna is super nice but her class is extremely boring. I STRONGLY recommend not taking this class in the morning. You will literally fall asleep. She isn't a tough grader but her class is very essay heavy so be prepared to write. She is super approachable and understanding but isn't super tech savvy so when it comes to online she's hard to reach.

I took her ENGL1101 class in the fall and loved her, so I took her ENGL1102 class. She was very chill and did not give much homework, if she did it was a fun topic to write about. MY FAVORITE professor all year. do all the work & peer reviews. Peer reviews are a grade, but also help you a lot. engage in the class. It's so much fun it everyone does

Donna is an absolute unit of a teacher. She gives homework twice a week in the from of discussions posts. They are super easy however and you can take care of them in advance. Probably takes like 10-15 min. You can write whatever you want to write about on essays as well which makes it super easy to knock out her 3 page requirement. I love Donna.

Professor Cochran is pretty chill and her class is pretty straight forward. 3 essays and discoussion posts/homework (3 assignments a week). This class contains a good amount of writing but Professor Cochran is an easy grader, shes not too tough. She is also lenient with the homework assignments. TRUST ME AND TAKE HER!

Ms. Cochran's class was average. I took it virtually. We had 4 major assignments. 3 essays that ranged from 3-5 page minimums and one group project. We had small readings and discussion assigned for homework. Attendance covers 10 % of grade so you want to attend class to get all of those points. Overall, it was not bad, but be prepared to write.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Group projects
